riskDetection.title: Risk Detection
riskDetection.description: Identify structural, legal, and financial risks before making an offer

marketAnalysis.title: Market Analysis
marketAnalysis.description: See if you're paying a fair price for the property

investmentInsights.title: Investment Insights
investmentInsights.description: Understand if this property is a good investment for your goals

upload.title: Upload Sales Prospectus / Brochure
upload.subtitle: Drag and drop the PDF document for AI analysis

validation.multipleFilesDrop: Please drop only one PDF file at a time.
validation.multipleFilesSelect: Please select only one PDF file at a time.
validation.fileSizeLimit: File size must be less than 50MB.

cta.title: Ready to make informed property decisions?
cta.description: Turn your sales prospectuses / brochures into actionable insights with intelligent analysis that uncovers hidden risks and opportunities.

demo.title: Or try an example
demo.tooltip: Every document is an authentic Norwegian sales report ‚Äì select one and click on the Analyze Document-button to reveal key highlights and insights of the home fast

error.noResultMessage: No analysis result was found. This might happen if you navigated to this page directly or if there was an issue retrieving the result.
error.invalidDocumentMessage: This does not appear to be a property report. Please upload the correct document.
error.insufficientDataMessage: Could not find enough property information in the document. Please ensure the document contains property details like address, price, and property description.
error.classificationErrorMessage: There was an error analyzing your document. Please try uploading again.
error.processingErrorMessage: There was an error processing your document. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

analysis.pdfGenerationError: Failed to generate PDF. Please try again.

summary.limitedAnalysisMessage: The AI returned a text summary instead of structured data. For the best experience with specific strong points and concerns, please try uploading your document again.
summary.formatLabel: Format: Text summary (AI did not return structured JSON)
summary.tipMessage: For a more detailed analysis with specific strong points and areas of concern, try uploading your document again. Our AI will attempt to provide a more structured analysis.
summary.pdfNotAvailableMessage: PDF download is not available for summary format. Please analyze your document again for a structured report.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: PropertyWise is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our AI-powered property analysis services.
introduction.commitment: As a Norwegian company, we comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Norwegian privacy laws. This policy describes your rights and how we handle your personal information.

documentData.title: Document Processing Data
documentData.pdfFiles: Property PDF documents you upload for analysis (processed temporarily)
documentData.propertyInfo: Property information extracted from your documents
documentData.temporaryProcessing: File processing data (not permanently stored on our servers)

preferences.title: User Preferences
preferences.theme: Display theme preference (light or dark mode)
preferences.localStorage: Analysis results stored locally in your browser

notice.title: Important Note
notice.description: We do not collect personal information, create user accounts, or store your documents permanently. Most data is processed temporarily and stored locally in your browser.

propertyAnalysis.title: Document Analysis Services
propertyAnalysis.description: We process your PDF documents using Google Gemini AI to extract property information and provide structured analysis with insights about strong points, concerns, and recommendations.

serviceProvision.title: Service Functionality
serviceProvision.description: To provide core functionality including file upload, AI processing, result display, and language/theme preferences.

improvement.title: Service Improvement
improvement.description: To improve our AI analysis accuracy and user experience through anonymized usage patterns (no personal data involved).

legal.title: Legal and Security
legal.description: To maintain security, prevent abuse, and comply with legal obligations including error logging and basic security monitoring.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Third Parties
dataSharing.description: We share minimal data only with essential service providers for core functionality:

serviceProviders.title: Essential Service Providers
serviceProviders.aiProcessing: Google Gemini AI (for temporary document analysis only)
serviceProviders.analytics: Basic web analytics (if enabled via feature flags)
serviceProviders.payment: No payment processors - service is currently free

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.description: We may disclose information if required by Norwegian law, court order, or to protect against security threats.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your personal data:

technical.title: Technical Safeguards
technical.monitoring: Continuous security monitoring and threat detection

organizational.title: Organizational Measures
organizational.staffTraining: Regular privacy and security training for staff

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: Since we don't store personal data permanently, most data retention is managed by your browser:

yourRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
yourRights.description: Under GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Right to Access
access.description: Request copies of your personal data we process

rectification.title: Right to Rectification
rectification.description: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.description: Request deletion of your personal data under certain conditions

restriction.title: Right to Restrict Processing
restriction.description: Request limitation of processing under certain circumstances

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.description: Request transfer of your data to another service provider

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.description: Object to processing based on legitimate interest or direct marketing

exercising.title: Exercising Your Rights
exercising.description: To exercise any of these rights, contact us at privacy@propertywise.no. We will respond within 30 days.

cookies.title: Cookies and Local Storage
cookies.description: We use minimal browser storage technologies for functionality:

essential.title: Essential Storage
essential.description: Local storage for analysis results and temporary session data

functional.title: Functional Storage
functional.description: Browser preferences for language, theme, and feature flag settings

analytics.title: Analytics (Optional)
analytics.description: Basic usage statistics only if analytics features are enabled

cookies.management: Data is stored locally in your browser and automatically cleared when you clear browser data. No tracking cookies are used.

featureFlags.title: Feature Flags and Functionality
featureFlags.description: Our application uses feature flags to control which features are enabled or disabled. These flags are evaluated at build time and affect what functionality is available to you:

staticEvaluation.title: Static Evaluation
staticEvaluation.description: Feature flags are read from environment variables once during build time and remain consistent throughout your session.

featureFlags.noPersonalData: Feature flag settings do not involve any personal data collection and are determined by the application configuration, not user preferences.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.description: Some of our service providers may be located outside the EU/EEA. When we transfer data internationally, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place.
internationalTransfers.safeguards: We use secure agreements, approved frameworks, and other protective measures to keep your data safe during international transfers.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: For any privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, please contact us:

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update this privacy policy to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Updates will be posted on this page with a new effective date. Since we don't collect contact information, please check this page periodically for updates.
